reviewText: A bunch of us ladies workout at lunch in a conference room.  We use a laptop and projector with exercise dvd's.  This one is great.  It is a very good workout.  May have to start out slow and build up.  But you definitely get a workout.

Love this one soo much. You really can't go wrong with Michelle Dozies.  The only issue I have is my knees start to really feel bad after 2 weeks of peek 10 workouts.  They are good for a quick body change, but just like Insanity,  they aren't ones I can do long term. I so wish she would come out with a program that features 30 minute workouts.  Overall i really love her style. It's fun and you never get bored!!!!!
She great she makes it fun to workout. Go for it. It was tough at the beginning but i keep going every other day.
